transcript_text:
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: To agar abhi connect karna hai, abhi kar lete hain.
Executive: Haan, abhi kar lete hain sir, kyunki zyada behtar rahega isme.
Customer: Abhi senior bhi baithe hue the, unko bhi le leta hu video call pe.
Executive: Zyada behtar rahega.
Customer: Dekhiye aapko maine ek mail se registration mail ID pe.
Executive: Mail ID batao sir jo yaha pe register hai.
Customer: Aa gaya aapka. DMM@
Executive: Ji.

(silence)

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, sir main kaam karta hu aapko apni screen share karta hu.
Executive: Sir agar behtar hoga ki hum na, main us pe hi matlab baat pe hi, usi mein baat kar le video call pe.
Executive: Haan haan baat hum aise kar lete hain, video pe nahi yaar. To wo phir aawaz aayega na, aap aise hi karte hain, main aapko dekho screen share kiya tha.

(silence)

Executive: Matlab call pe hi baat karenge.
Customer: Haan call pe kar lete hain yaar, call pe theek hai. Usme dikkat hai koi?
Executive: Nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi sir.
Customer: Maine ki ye tha ki hum jaise call pe baat kar rahe hain, to senior bhi hai. To senior bhi sunte hain, aise sirf hum hi aapki baat karenge.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: To yaha pe agar need, jaha pe need hogi main call lunga transfer kar dunga. Koi dikkat nahi. Theek hai baki haan baki navigate jo hai yaha pe karte hain.
Executive: Haan aap sir aap present time pe buyleads pe jaaiye sir.
Customer: Dekho sir main buyleads pe gaya.
Executive: Yaha pe main aapko apni, sir aap apni screen band kariye main apni screen share karta hu aapko. Profile open kar rahe ho?
Customer: Chalo off kar lo.
Executive: Yaar keyword maine dalna hai na. Chalo off karo phir bhi.
Executive: Isko thoda zoom kar lo yaar. Kaafi sabse zyada zoom ho gaya.

Executive: Dekhiye ye yaha pe hai jo hamare paas present time pe buyleads present hai.
Executive: Jaise metal looping sheet hai, ispe hum deal karte hain?
Customer: Ye metal kaun sa hai? Aluminium hai? Pehle apna ek aluminium mera haan aap aluminium coil dalo usme.
Customer: Upar buylead mein aluminium coil dalo.
